corpus

Class Vector

  • java.lang.Object
    • corpus.Vector

  • public class Vector
extends java.lang.Object
    The vector Class represent a row vector and provides the fundamental vector operations.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Vector(int dimension)
      Constructs and initializes a vector with a specified dimension.

      The scalar multiplication

      return a 2-norm of a vector.

      The scalar product.

      • similarity

        public double similarity(Vector vec)
        Returns the Cosine similarity. Cosine similarity is a measure of similarity between two non-zero vectors of an inner product space that measures the cosine of the angle between them.
        Parameters:
        vec - another vector
        Returns:
        the similarity between two vectors.
